Posts.Content: Mar 18, 2015 10:11AM Charstad wrote: I'm trying not to cry. I am so relieved to find you guys. I had 2 lumpectomies about a year ago. I have had so much pain since. Doctors tell me to take vitamins and change my diet but offer no other help. I have breast pain that is sometimes severe and often have shoulder or neck pain with it. I was starting to believe everyone who was saying it was in my head and I needed to get over it!
Posts.Title: Pain After Lumpectomy Ljackson_61 NATSGSG
